  • Game Description and Features:

Space Invader is a 1978 arcade game created by Tomohiro Nishikado. In the shooter genre, Space Invaders is the first permanent shooter and sets the template for the shooting genre. The goal is to defeat wave after wave of descending aliens with lasers that move horizontally to get as many points as possible.

  • Game Running Instructions:

To run it, here we are using python version 3.9.2. Then, first install the python library, namely pygame. Next, make sure you have the source code from the invader space and its assets that are in the same file, then if so, open visual studio code / another text editor, and run the source code.

 

  • Game Play Instructions:

- Right Arrow and Left Arrow buttons on the keyboard - Move the Spaceship

- Space key on keyboard - Shoot bullets vertically from Spaceship

- To win the game, the Spaceship must defeat the aliens by shooting bullets at all aliens, until there are no aliens left.

- When the Spaceship is hit by a bullet fired by an alien, the health bar on the Spaceship will decrease, and if the health bar on the Spaceship runs out, the game will be declared lose (finished).
